links.*: The Gest of Beren and Lúthien
The Lord of the Rings (1979 radio series)

wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''[[2 January|2]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to E.V. Gordon (2 January 1929)|a letter to E.V. Gordon]].

==June==
* '''[[18 June|18]]''' - [[Priscilla Tolkien]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s only daughter, is born.
* '''[[23 June|23]]''' - [[Barbara Remington]], cover artist on some American editions, is born.

==July==
* '''?''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] makes a recording for the ''[[Linguaphone Conversational Course]]''.
==October==
* '''[[10 October|10]]''' - [[Bernard Mayes]], the adapter and voice of [[Gandalf]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1979 radio series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (1979 radio series)]] and [[The Hobbit (1979 radio series)|''The Hobbit'' (1979 radio series)]], is born.
==December==
* '''[[7 December|7]]''' - [[C.S. Lewis]] sent a letter to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] informing tha have read [[The Gest of Beren and Lúthien]]. 
* '''[[26 December|26]]''' - [[Father Christmas]] writes a [[Letters from Father Christmas|letter]] to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s children.

==?==
* '''?''' - ''[[Essays and Studies (1929)|Essays And Studies (vol. 14, 1929)]]'', including the essay '[[Ancrene Wisse and Hali Meiðhad]]' by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], is published.
* '''?''' - [[Daphne Castell]] is born.
